summary: This bill, the 'America's First Fuels Act,' amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to incentivize the use of biomass for heating. It increases the limitation for the energy efficient home improvement credit related to biomass stoves and boilers. It also introduces a new 'open-loop biomass heating property credit,' offering a 30 percent tax credit for biomass heating property. These changes are effective for property placed in service after December 31, 2025.
